      • ImuPublisher

        public ImuPublisher(SensorManager manager,
                    int sensorDelay,
                    java.lang.String nodeName)
        Create a new publisher with imu data
        Parameters:
        manager - SensorManager created with activity context
        sensorDelay - delay in millis between publishing sensor data
        nodeName - publisher node name

      • ImuPublisher

        public ImuPublisher(SensorManager manager,
                    int sensorDelay,
                    StateConsciousTouchListener touchListener,
                    java.lang.String nodeName)
        Create a new publisher with imu data, whos publishing status is dependent on touch state
        Parameters:
        manager - SensorManager created with activity context
        sensorDelay - delay in millis between publishing sensor data
        touchListener - StateConsciousTouchListener used as a trigger to enable/disable sensor data publishing
        nodeName - publisher node name
